headline: Biohaven (BHVN) Is Down 5.9% After New BHV-1510 Combo Data - What's Changed
summary: Earlier in December 2025, Biohaven Ltd. reported new clinical safety and efficacy data at the ESMO Immuno-Oncology Congress for its Trop2-directed antibody drug conjugate BHV-1510 combined with Regeneron's anti-PD-1 therapy cemiplimab across multiple solid tumors. The data showed a high confirmed objective response rate at the selected dose and durable responses beyond six months, highlighting BHV-1510’s potential relevance in combination immunotherapy for difficult-to-treat cancers. We’ll...
